content: 6= 18 4 2 single_crochet increase x 6= 24 5 blo single_crochet in each st around 6 single_crochet in each st around 7 increase x 3 18 single_crochet increase x 3= 30 8 2 single_crochet increase x 10= 40 9 4 single_crochet increase x 8= 48 10 single_crochet in each st around 11 7 single_crochet increase x 6= 54 12 8 single_crochet increase x 6= 60 13 single_crochet in each st around 14 9 single_crochet increase x 6= 66 15 17 single_crochet decrease 12 single_crochet decrease 12 single_crochet decrease 19 single_crochet= 63 16 20 single_crochet increase x 3= 66 17 21 single_crochet increase x 3= 69 f/o and weave in the tail end collar with color c chain approximately 28 you may need to adjust this try it out on your dog and see if it fits around his neck 1 half_double_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook and across f/o and leave a long tail for sewing sweet oddity art 6 assembly head and body 1 the back end of the body is where the last stitch was made pin the head to the body for extra support sew the back loops round to the head sweet oddity art 7 ears 1 pin the ears to the head approximately between rounds 28 and 29 2 sew the ears to the head to get the flowing look bend the ears into an s shape sweet oddity art 8 collar and pumpkin 1 pin the collar around the neck sew the collar together to hold in place 2 take some black embroidery thread and thread your needle insert the needle into a hole on the side of the pumpkin bring the needle up to another hole and embroider a smile embroider two eyes weave in the tail ends 3 add some blush to the cheeks if you want with actual blush or pink crayon sweet oddity art 9 you now have your finished zero thank you for your purchase if you have any questions or concerns please email me at sweetoddityart@gmail com or etsy convo me i will get back to you asap please share your finished zero with me as often as you want i love seeing them sweet oddity art 10 helpful tips exact colors and brand of yarn used 1 white i love this yarn white 2 orange i love this yarn desert glaze 3 red i love this yarn red you can use different eye and nose sizes you might have to adjust the placements if you change the sizes you can use different hook sizes and weights of yarn it will just change the size of your zero and you might need to adjust eye and nose placement how you stuff matters the type of stuffing you use how you stuff all this matters on how your zero turns out i prefer polyfil stuffing but you can use other types sweet oddity art 11
